com.chessmaster.server.request

Class DatabaseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chessmaster.server.request.DatabaseHandler

  • public class DatabaseHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles connections with the database. Hardcoded values: url = "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/chess" login = "root" password = "root"
    Author:
    zyixc
